channel.title: meta on Nailing Jelly
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Nailing Jelly

item.title: Relocation....
item.description: I’m shunting this blog across to wordpress - mainly to be able to use some of the tools available, such as the blogging bundle in TextMate, to handle blog posts. The main thing is that I have no intention of doing software maintenance on a blogging platform (unless I’m being paid for it), so I am sticking with a hosted platform. You may also find that the theme and layout (assuming you are looking here rather than reading via RSS) may keep changing in the short term until I get to like one look.

item.title: The Return
item.description: Hmm.. it’s been a while. A very long while in fact. However I think I will resurrect this blog - I did wonder about quietly killing it and starting another rather than have the embarassment of an 18 month gap in posting, but I’ll live with that for now. We can at least see where it goes from here.
